message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10000.
Thank you for offering the product at $10000, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, my budget is quite tight at the moment. Would you consider selling the product for $9500?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $9750.
I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to pay $9600 for the product. This price aligns better with my current budget and financial constraints.
I understand your concerns about budget, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9600. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9700.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $9650 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9650. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9800.
